1.content: 'Uses basic debugging techniques with easily accessible tools. Needs guidance to identify focused area of investigation.'

2.content: 'Uses tools during development to identify likely issues. Identifies promising areas for focused investigation.'

3.content: 'Uses scientific method in existing codebase to identify and solve issues. Can articulate a hypothesis of the issue.'

4.content: 'Uses advanced debugging techniques to analyze code during debugging. Can create a reduced test case to identify issues. Understands and uses tools to prevent new issues.'
